Detailed Description

Class that manages the module.

It basically either gives control to the text file output command or gives control to the forum handler.

Author:
Salman Noor
MIU Intern School of Electrical Engineering, WITS Unversity
Version:
0.68
Date:
May 3, 2010
Bug:

Possible bugs are text file handling.

If a text file does not exist, chisimba will output warnings.

Warning:
Make sure that all text files are in the text files folder.
Do NOT rename or delete the text files as their names are arguments to this class.
Do NOT change the text files path.
Make sure that the text files are in HTML format or it will display gargligok.

Returns:

Get text file from query string from the side_navigation_links_handler_class_inc.php and set default to home.txt if it does not exits

The member function getParam is a member function of the controller class

Set the file path

Open the file

Read from the entire file until its end and store the data into a temporary variable

Close the file

The member function setVar is from the controller class of chisimba's core

__getMethod ( $  action  )  [private]

Get an action.

Parameters:
action A string
Returns:
the method that corresponds to the action

Checks using __validAction if the action exists and returns the corresponding method

If methos does not exist return the method __view which takes you to the messages handler class
